statements.select: SELECT * FROM ANSIPCImpactCheck WHERE ANSIPCImpactCheckDate BETWEEN #StartDate# AND #EndDate# $sql$

select case when exists( SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ANSIPCImpactCheck] WHERE ForANSIOrJIS=#value#
) then 1 else 0 end
select top 1 * from dbo.ANSIPCImpactCheck where ForANSIOrJIS=#value# order by InsertTime
select top 1 * from dbo.ANSIPCImpactCheck where ForANSIOrJIS=#value# order by InsertTime desc
select top 1 * from dbo.ANSIPCImpactCheck where InsertTime < #InsertTime# and ForANSIOrJIS=#ForANSIOrJIS# order by InsertTime desc
select top 1 * from dbo.ANSIPCImpactCheck where InsertTime > #InsertTime# and ForANSIOrJIS=#ForANSIOrJIS# order by InsertTime
select case when exists( select * from dbo.ANSIPCImpactCheck where InsertTime < #InsertTime# and ForANSIOrJIS=#ForANSIOrJIS# ) then 1 else 0 end
select case when exists( select * from dbo.ANSIPCImpactCheck where InsertTime > #InsertTime# and ForANSIOrJIS=#ForANSIOrJIS# ) then 1 else 0 end
